page.title: 07Bicknoller Post Office
page.content: When we first went into the Post Office it appeared very small.It was like a cupboard.The owner and Postmaster,Mrs Cartwright explained that the{Post Office}was at first the garage of her home.Two years ago they decided to convert it into a Post Office for the benefit of the Village. It took a long time to obtain {permission for the conversion}and then to build and to get all the stock in. Before they could open it they had to{receive training}on the running of a village Post Office. They carry a wide range of Post Office goods and T.V. licences. They have stamps up to Â£5 in value and also many other things conncected with a small sub Post Office.
